Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials

Here are all Materials used for the Geometric Objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasAlphaMap  
    HasAmbientEmissiveColor
    The Material has both an Ambient and Emissive colors.
    HasBumpMap  
    HasColor
    Material has a color.
    HasEnvMap
    Material has environmental texture.
    HasFog
    Define whether the material color is affected by global fog settings.
    HasLightMap
    Material has light texture
    HasMap
    Material has texture
    HasMaterialMap
    Material has different textures.
    HasNormalMap  
    HasShading  
    HasSkinning  
    HasSpecularMap  
    HasVertexColors
    Define whether the material uses vertex colors, or not.
    HasWireframe
    Material has wireframe
    HasWrap
    Material has wrap.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LineBasicMaterial
    A material for drawing wireframe-style geometries.
    LineDashedMaterial  
    Material
    Materials describe the appearance of objects.
    MeshBasicMaterial
    A material for drawing geometries in a simple shaded (flat or wireframe) way.
    MeshDepthMaterial  
    MeshFaceMaterial  
    MeshLambertMaterial  
    MeshNormalMaterial  
    MeshPhongMaterial  
    PointCloudMaterial  
    ShaderMaterial  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Material.BLENDING
    Blending modes
    Material.COLORS
    Colors
    Material.SHADING
    Shading
    Material.SIDE
    Material sides
